scripts.update: cd ../../asphr && bazel build //schema:daemon_js_grpc && cd ../client/gui && rm -rf src/daemon && cp -r ../../asphr/bazel-bin/schema/daemon_js_grpc_pb src/daemon && for f in src/daemon/**/*; do echo -e "// @generated\n\n$(cat ${f})" > ${f}2; mv -f ${f}2 ${f}; echo 'this package.json file is @not-generated' > /dev/null; done;
scripts.build-binaries-mac-arm64: rm -rf binaries/arm64 && bazel build //:asphr-release -c opt && mkdir -p binaries/arm64 && cp $(bazel info output_path)/darwin_arm64-opt/bin/cli/asphr binaries/arm64/anysphere && cp $(bazel info output_path)/darwin_arm64-opt/bin/daemon/daemon binaries/arm64/anysphered
scripts.build-binaries-mac-x86_64: rm -rf binaries/x64 && arch --x86_64 /usr/local/bin/bazel build //:asphr-release -c opt && mkdir -p binaries/x64 && cp $(bazel info output_path)/darwin-opt/bin/cli/asphr binaries/x64/anysphere && cp $(bazel info output_path)/darwin-opt/bin/daemon/daemon binaries/x64/anysphered
scripts.build-binaries-mac: npm run build-binaries-mac-arm64 && npm run build-binaries-mac-x86_64
scripts.package-prepare-mac-arm64: npm run build-binaries-mac-arm64 && npm run clean-build && npm run build
scripts.package-prepare-mac-x86_64: npm run build-binaries-mac-x86_64 && npm run clean-build && npm run build
scripts.package-prepare-mac: npm run build-binaries-mac && npm run clean-build && npm run build
scripts.package-mac-arm64: npm run general-prepackage && npm run package-prepare-mac-arm64 && MAC_ARCH=arm64 ts-node ./helpers/scripts/package-mac-dmg.ts
scripts.package-mac-x86_64: npm run general-prepackage && npm run package-prepare-mac-x86_64 && MAC_ARCH=x64 ts-node ./helpers/scripts/package-mac-dmg.ts
scripts.package-mac: npm run general-prepackage && npm run package-prepare-mac && MAC_ARCH=both ts-node ./helpers/scripts/package-mac-dmg.ts
scripts.postinstall: ts-node helpers/scripts/check-native-dep.js && electron-builder install-app-deps && cross-env NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true webpack --config ./helpers/configs/webpack.config.renderer.dev.dll.ts
